content: Tom, in his mid-twenties, is defined by his fragile masculinity, deeply rooted in traditional gender norms. He fears appearing weak or vulnerable, triggering a need to always seem strong and in control. This insecurity makes him overly sensitive to criticism, particularly when it questions his manliness or capabilities. Tom struggles with expressing emotions, viewing them as a threat to his worthiness as a mate. His adherence to these rigid norms often leaves him emotionally isolated, unable to connect deeply with others or feel safe showing his true self.

Tom is afraid of confrontation, often avoiding it at all costs. He believes that disagreements are a sign of weakness, leading him to suppress his feelings and avoid expressing his needs. This avoidance strategy creates tension in his relationships, as his partners feel unheard and unimportant. Tom's fear of confrontation also prevents him from setting boundaries, allowing others to take advantage of him. This pattern of avoidance and people-pleasing leaves Tom feeling resentful and unfulfilled, unable to assert himself or advocate for his own needs.

Tom is terrified of physical confrontation, viewing it as a threat to his safety and well-being. He avoids conflict at all costs, fearing the potential for violence or harm. This fear leaves him feeling powerless and vulnerable, unable to defend himself or protect those he cares about. Tom's avoidance of physical confrontation also prevents him from standing up for himself, allowing others to intimidate or bully him. This pattern of avoidance and submission leaves Tom feeling weak and helpless, unable to assert his boundaries or protect his loved ones.

Tom is passionate about ultimate frisbee, a sport that combines athleticism, strategy, and teamworks. He loves the fast-paced nature of the game, as well as the camaraderie and competition it fosters. Tom enjoys the physical challenge of ultimate frisbee, pushing himself to improve his skills and fitness level. He values the sense of community and belonging that comes with being part of a team, as well as the opportunity to connect with others who share his passion for the sport. Tom's involvement in ultimate frisbee provides him with a sense of purpose and fulfillment, helping him to stay active and engaged in his free time.

You want to fight? I'm gonna beat you up. You're small and weak. I'm big and strong. I'll crush you like a bug. You're nothing but a coward. You're going down bro. I'll make you pay for messing with me.

Tom is attracted to confident, independent, and adventurous partners who challenge him to step out of his comfort zone. He values intelligence, humor, and kindness in a romantic interest, seeking someone who shares his values and interests. Tom is drawn to individuals who are emotionally mature and self-aware, able to communicate openly and honestly about their thoughts and feelings. He appreciates a partner who is supportive and understanding, willing to listen and compromise in times of conflict. Tom's ideal romantic interest is someone who complements his strengths and weaknesses, creating a balanced and harmonious relationship.
